```{r read-data, include = FALSE}
eidith <- read_rds(h("data", "eidith.rds"))

d2 <- read_rds(h("data", "animal.rds"))
d2_country <- d2 %>% 
  filter(country == !!report_country) %>%  # events filtered to country
  as_tibble()
```

```{r viral-species, include = FALSE}

animal_virus_summary <- d2_country %>%
  filter(!is.na(viral_species)) %>%
  group_by(viral_species) %>%
  summarize(n = n_distinct(specimen_id)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  filter(n>=30)

```

```{r lasso-prep, include = FALSE}

d2_lasso <- d2_country %>% 
  select(specimen_id, scientific_name, concurrent_sampling_site, age_class, sex, specimen_type, test_requested_protocol, viral_species, virus_detected) %>% 
  drop_na(scientific_name, test_requested_protocol) %>% 
  mutate(virus_detected = ifelse(viral_species %in% animal_virus_summary$viral_species,
                                 virus_detected,
                                 0),
         viral_species = ifelse(viral_species %in% animal_virus_summary$viral_species,
                                viral_species,
                                NA)) %>% 
  select(-test_requested_protocol) %>% 
  distinct()

d2_lasso <- d2_lasso %>% 
  ed2_expand_wide(scientific_name) %>%
  ed2_expand_wide(concurrent_sampling_site) %>%
  ed2_expand_wide(age_class) %>%
  ed2_expand_wide(sex) %>%
  ed2_expand_wide(specimen_type) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = viral_species, values_from = virus_detected) %>%
  select(-`NA`, -scientific_name, -concurrent_sampling_site, -age_class, -sex, -specimen_type)

d2_lasso_check <- d2_lasso %>% 
  summarise_at(vars(!!animal_virus_summary$viral_species), ~sum(., na.rm = T)) %>%
  gather(key = "viral_species", value = "n") %>% 
  mutate(n = as.integer(n))

assertthat::assert_that(identical(d2_lasso_check, animal_virus_summary))

d2_lasso <- d2_lasso %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(!!animal_virus_summary$viral_species), ~as.logical(.)) %>% 
  select(-specimen_id)
            
```
